name: Saven Technologies
tagline: A leader in technology driven business solutions
description:
At Saven, we started creating mobile applications back in the end 90s. Serious mobile development, unlike much of web development, is about native application development. Browser based web applications are way below expectations in many cases even today, when full blown browsers have started appearing on the devices.
At Saven we are extremely competent with building applications for the Symbian, iPhone and the Google Android platform.
